content.title: Nearly 75% of SIR digitisation complete in Ernakulam
content.body: Breaking update: As per data compiled, Kothamangalam Assembly constituency leads the digitisation process with 77.71%, followed by Kalamassery (77.56%), Kunnathunad (77.54%), and Paravur (76.92%)
